attributes.action: Allow people to serve time in jail if they lied about rape
attributes.additional_details: Becuase a number a people’s of lives have been ruined by false rape allegations and cost them their job and more
attributes.background: Change the law so people can be arrested if they make false rape allegations and pay a fine aswell

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, because this can already happen. You can find out more here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/false-allegations-rape-andor-domestic-abuse-see-guidance-charging-perverting-course
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
